short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pattern by lines connecting two rotating points

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This application draws multiple lines connecting two rotating points at various speeds. This is a customizable app using which you will be able to change:
1. The rotating speed of points
2. Distance between two rotating points
3. Line color
4. Background color

Other important features of this application are:
1. Start stop animation in between
2. Reload animation
3. Download the finalized animation

Enjoy this magical work of maths :)
